Desc.entry: Andy Cahill tutors in saxophone, flute, music theory and improvisation. With over 30 years playing experience, having worked in the past with such artists as George Benson, Barry White and Carl Perkins. Teaches all age groups in their own homes. Style of tuition has more emphasis on encouragement than pressure on the student. Will travel to students home in Sheffield, Rotherham, Chesterfield and Worksop.
